Banner.Description: Welcome to my portfolio! I am a student focused on programming, deeply fascinated by technology and the universe. I am passionate about understanding the world and creating efficient solutions with a collective purpose. Always driven by discovery and the advancement of the heart.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Since I was young, I have been drawn to the world of technology and how it can transform the way we live, work, and learn. This curiosity led me to explore programming and discover the power of turning ideas into real solutions.

I am a disciplined and consistent person, qualities I have strengthened through gym and calisthenics. I firmly believe in daily effort, self-improvement, and continuous learning as the foundation of professional growth.

I am passionate about mathematics and problem solving, as they allow me to analyze and understand challenges with logic and creativity. These skills drive me to keep learning every day in my journey toward a degree in Systems Engineering, a goal I am determined to achieve with excellence.

I have developed small projects using PHP, including an institutional website and other simple yet efficient practices that have helped me strengthen my knowledge in web development and clean coding principles.

I aspire to continue growing in the technological field and contribute with innovative solutions that make a real impact. For this reason, opportunities like the Quipux Scholarship represent a key step for me to keep advancing my education and contribute to my country’s technological development.
Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
